# strokeTexture

**Instance Property**

The texture used to stroke the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var strokeTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

```swift
var strokeTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`. If a stroke texture is specified, the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKShapeNode/strokeColor] property is ignored and the stroked portion of the shape node is rendered using the texture instead.

## Stroking a Shape

- **lineWidth**: The width used to stroke the path.
- **strokeColor**: The color used to stroke the shape.
- **glowWidth**: A glow that extends outward from the stroked line.
- **lineCap**: The style used to render the endpoints of the stroked portion of the shape node.
- **lineJoin**: The junction type used when the stroked portion of the shape node is rendered.
- **miterLimit**: The miter limit to use when the line is stroked using a miter join style.
- **isAntialiased**: A Boolean value that determines whether the stroked path is smoothed when drawn.
